'''Roger''' is a [[Northland Cat]] and resident of the [[Cat's Tail]] tavern.

==Profile==
Roger enjoys climbing up on rooftops, as well as playing with cat toys. He looks smug, but becomes loving and affectionate the moment he sees people. The customers at the tavern love him because of this behavior, and would ask if he is around upon entering.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|To Catch a Kitten}}</ref>

==Trivia==
*The names of Roger, [[Nelson (Cat)|Nelson]], and [[Paisley]], the three cats from the Cat's Tail, are references to the musician {{w|Prince (musician)|Prince}}. His full name was Prince Rogers Nelson and Paisley Park is the name of his recording studio/residence and one of his {{w|Paisley Park (song)|songs}}. [[Margaret]], the owner of the Cat's Tail, also owns another cat named [[Prince]].
